feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2025-08-05: Release of version 9.6.2 is available
entry.content: The version 9.6.2 is available. Fixed bugs #883 and #885. Added 4 plugins with new implementations of the IRR Cohen's kappa (weighted and unweighted, with or without modifiers) See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/tree/master/boris/analysis_plugins
entry.summary: The version 9.6.2 is available. Fixed bugs #883 and #885. Added 4 plugins with new implementations of the IRR Cohen's kappa (weighted and unweighted, with or without modifiers) See https://github.com/olivierfriard/BORIS/tree/master/boris/analysis_plugins

entry.title: 2025-08-26: Release of version 9.6.3 is available
entry.content: The version 9.6.3 is available. Fixed bugs #875 and #886
entry.summary: The version 9.6.3 is available. Fixed bugs #875 and #886

entry.title: 2025-09-02: Release of version 9.6.5 is available
entry.content: The version 9.6.5 is available. The IRR Cohen's kappa plugins were improved: a value for rounding times can now be selected
entry.summary: The version 9.6.5 is available. The IRR Cohen's kappa plugins were improved: a value for rounding times can now be selected

entry.title: 2025-10-22: Release of version 9.7.1
entry.content: The version 9.7.1 is available. This version should run om macOS natively with some limits. See [macOS version](https://www.boris.unito.it/download_mac)
entry.summary: The version 9.7.1 is available. This version should run om macOS natively with some limits. See [macOS version](https://www.boris.unito.it/download_mac)
